tool_description:
Api provides simple way to unshort url.
https://t.co/6ErIpGUSwN -> https://www.huffpost.com/entry/jiff-the-dog-wins-halloween_n_56327e41e4b00aa54a4d7a89?ncid=fcbklnkushpmg00000022&utm_content=buffer83279&utm_medium=social&utm_source=twitter.com&utm_campaign=buffer
name: URLS UN-SHORTERER
title: URLS UN-SHORTERER

api_list.name: Unshort url by given url
api_list.description:
U have to add valid url query. For example ?url=https://url<link> or ?url=https://t.co/6ErIpGUSwN
URL query is required.
